solution.text:
Here a = 2, r = 2 and n = _{p}_
Using the sum formula
\(S_n=\frac{a(r^n-1)}{r-1}\)
\we have
\(S_n=2(2^{_{p}_}-1)=_{{2*((2**p)-1)}}_\)

content.text: A person has 2 parents, 4 grandparents, 8 great grandparents, and so on.Find the number of his ancestors during the _{p}_ generations preceding his own.
